description: A simple cli tool to create a new node project with our boilerplate.
name: ssg-node-cli
readme:
# ssg-node-cli
**What is this?**

A simple cli tool to create a new node project with our boilerplate.

**Installation:**

```
	npm i ssg-node-cli -g
```


**Usage:**

```
	ssg-node {project-name}
```


**Requirements:**
- node 6+
